website_summaries.verdict: From easy operation  to durability to extreme effectiveness, this waterproof electronic foot file is a must-have for soft and smooth feet.
pros: This electronic foot file comes with everything you need for baby-soft feet: the rechargeable foot file, a coarse roller head, two bonus roller heads, and a charging station complete with a wall plug
We love the dual speed settings and soft touch handle
cons: If you apply too much pressure while using this product, it will automatically stop rolling

website_summaries.verdict: Take this high-quality foot file in the shower or bathtub with you because it's completely waterproof.
pros: Dual speed settings allow you to choose the best speed for removing dry dead skin
Pack includes 1 electric foot filer, 1 regular coarse roller head, and a charging dock with wall plug
of filing time, with recommended 3 hr
cons: "Soft Touch" and "Extra Coarse" are sold separately

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: The Amopé Pedi Perfect worked very well - at least, it did until it stopped working a month and a half after I purchased it. It looks as though it is charging, but absolutely nothing functions even after a full day’s charge. Dead as a door nail. Very disappointed! Of course the timing was right after Amazon’s 30 day return policy...
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS ONE - WILL NOT CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to get this as my parents had one but VERY disappointed when i got this one... mine doesn’t charge on the dock. I’ve tried moving it around to see if maybe it’s not on there properly but nope, just won’t charge. and now it’s too late to send back and i’m left with a dead amope, yay. so i’m not too fond of this one.. if there is one that has batteries or plugs into a wall separately but doesn’t stand on a dock, get that instead. this is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya F

customer_reviews.title: This product really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This product really does work, but if your feet have deep cracks like mine did (I hate to wear shoes) it will take some time to get your feet looking good. I received my Pedi about 2 weeks ago and used it every 2-4 days. My feet look so much better and are already soft - almost perfect. I do have a few stubborn cracks that were very deep and to a point of bleeding, so I'm not surprised they are taking a little extra time to go away. I give it another week with the Pedi and believe my feet will be crack free. I very happy that I took a chance on this product.
customer_reviews.author: LambrinieCakes

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT AMOPE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two years ago and it stopped working recently. I got in touch with Amope to look into a product replacement and after looking through my photos they said it was a counterfeit device. The device I got from this seller looks very similar but it is NOT AUTHENTIC. So this is not a review of the device, it is a review of the seller who is falsely advertising that they sell Amope products when they do not. Amazon, you need to remove them as your top seller for this item!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Item would not charge all the way, not a sturdy charger station, would stop as soon as it hit the skin, maybe for a young person to do a light smooth job, but not for me and my feet are not bad, just heels a bit dry, cracked, was looking forward to it, will stick with hand files, tried them all and gave up, they all suck at performance, just not strong enough to do the job intended
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Charger issues
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned, the charger is an issue with this product. You would expect to be able to set the unit in the recharging cradle and it would start charging. But it doesn't sit well on the charger to make the connection. I've found that I have to put a counterweight on the end of the handheld unit to keep it weighted down in order to make the connection. That is really kind of ridiculous in this day and age. When the unit is charged though, it does a very good job smoothing away dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: PepeLaPue

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good, but charger didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived yesterday with a partial charge right out of the box. I tried it and liked the feel of it compared to the off-brand foot file I had been using. However, I realized the charger doesn't work, so the item is essentially useless. Also, the item has that ridiculous molded plastic packaging that was intertwined with the cardboard packaging inside, so there was no way to open it without destroying the packaging, so I don't know if I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer24601

customer_reviews.title: Defective charger, Amope will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the negative reviews, because right out of the box the Amope would not work. I plugged in the charger as directed and put the Amope on top. The green light flashed for a while and then stopped. I thought it was charged but it won't turn on. It is defective. Unfortunately I purchased this awhile ago but did not use. I did take it out of its impossible plastic packaging and stored it in my drawer until I was ready to use it. So like another reviewer I cannot return it. Had I read the negative reviews and not just the positive ones, I would have known about the faulty charger. I could kick myself.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a fake. The seams didn’t line up correctly, and the roller rubbed against the edges whilst in use. I highly doubt this would be waterproof considering the poor construction and lack of adequate seals. The charging dock was flimsy, and it barely lasted 5 mins before the battery died. I returned it and ordered a replacement that was sold and shipped by Amazon. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Obabakakayo

customer_reviews.title: Great... but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: My wife really liked this for the few times it worked before it broke. After less than 10 uses, it just stopped. When we turn it on now we can hear the motor spin but the abrasive surface doesn't budge. It must have broken a gear inside.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Stupidest waste of money EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't get swindled out of $40 bucks like I was! This is a total waste of money. It has an automatic safety shutoff that stops the rotation of the buffing stone whenever it encounters any kind of pressure. So you can't press it into your foot and really buff. You can only hold it very gently against your skin with NO pressure. With no pressure, the buffing is significantly less effective than if you just rubbed a regular foot file back and forth on your heel. This thing is completely useless and I threw it in the trash after one use. You'll get 100x better results from any $2 foot file. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: nyc mom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad result. I used couple times so far
customer_reviews.text: Not bad result. I used couple times so far. I can see some improvements. I posted before and after pictures for you to compare. As you can see, my heel still needs more work. But the rest is looking good to me. One thing I want to mention is DO NOT let it stay in one spot for too long, it will get really hot on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Yep, mine also died for no reason after 3 months of use. Can’t return it. Should’ve bought it from Costco. So annoyed. But either way, it wasn’t great. Yes, It files your feet and gets rid of any sharp dry skin, but if you have reoccurring deep cracks that need attention, this won’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Aa great of a product as an instant coffee machine 💗💗💗!!! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This product has change my life -as funny as it may sound!!!! As a mom of 4 kids I am on my feet ALL day long , and my feet take a beating . I thought the horrid-looking heels were here to stay. I would hide my feet , that's how terrible and dry and callused . I tried just about everything ... then this little lovey thing cane along . I WISH I had taken before and after pics . I am amazed . I LOVE LOVE this product cannot say enough good about it . Two thumbs UP... oh ,and beautiful feet too!!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Should've taken pictures!  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Product works much better than anticipated. I so appreciate when folks make the effort to take pics for their reviews, but didn't occur to me before I used it on my husband. We used to use a Dremel to get the thick, scaly calluses smoothed out (effective, but super dangerous, I know). This works a little slower (translation: safer) but gets the same, if not better result. Already ordered several extra course replacement heads. Buy it - worth every pennuy
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife about a year or two ago, and this thing really works. If used in conjunction with some of the good foot/skin creams like O'Keefe's or Gold Bond this will transform the rough dry skin on your feet. The before and after is really amazing. If you have that dry callus-like skin on your heels or the balls of your feet, you need this. Just be careful not to get overzealous with it. It will take off too much skin and cause you some discomfort for a day or two. I mean, it is a rotating abrasive stone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKeehan

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but charging cradle is crummy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foot file. I had some really bad calluses and cracked skin on my feet (due to AZ dry weather and year-round sandals). It took 3-4 sessions of using this, but my feet are sooo much smoother now. I now use it every 2-3 weeks to keep my feet nice and smooth. The only down side is that the charging cradle is extremely finicky!! You have to mess and wiggle the handle juuust so, otherwise it will not connect and charge. You might hear it humming, but if the little green light isn’t glowing- it won’t charge. That green light has to stay lit all through charging.
customer_reviews.author: Igga's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very, very pleased with the results with Amope
customer_reviews.text: Now that sandal season has arrived i needed to get serious about the dry, cracked appearance of my feet. I’ve used other manual callous/dry skin removers to varying degrees of success. I finally purchased the rechargeable, submersible Amope since it can be used anywhere and very conveniently. My feet are looking much better and with moisturizing are now looking like i have been receiving regular pedicures. I’m also happy that the Amope is effective without having to be aggressive. I frequently was over zealous with manual callous removal products and left sore spots there i had abraded my skin. It doesn’t appear possible to be overly aggressive with the Amope. I would recommend the Amope to friends.
customer_reviews.author: C. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Have a dog that hates getting their nails clipped?
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to combat Calis on my feet from wearing boots all the time and it works well. It also works excellent for trimming dogs toe nails. My pup hated getting her nails clipped. She just lays ther like she’s being pampered now. No more cracked nails for her or high blood pressure for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bocephus

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I didn't buy this sooner! This product is amazing and will definitely save me trips to the salon. I thought it would help a little, but it totally transformed my heels. Can't say anything about longevity, I just received it. But if it were to break after several uses. I'd still buy it again for how well it softens and transforms calloused skin. AMAZING. I don't think my heels ever feel this soft after a professional pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: Courtneyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Performance and Amazon guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. A year or two I purchased an off brand rechargeable foot file but it did not work well. Impossible to find replacement heads, wasn’t very powerful and didn’t hold a charge. My bad. Trying to save money. When will I learn that buying a less expensive item isn’t always the best thing to do. Very happy with the Amope. After using a few times my feet look like I have frequent professional pedicures. After using a quick rinse (waterproof) dry well and it’s ready to be recharged and used again. Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: natural

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on your heels and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s gentle and leaves my heels smooth without any cuts or making them sore. I’m glad I got the wet/dry version. Easy to clean and I can do it. Before or after a shower. I have definitely saved money on pedicures after purchasing this product. I bought the carrying case and took it on trips for touch ups because the sand really roughens my heels quickly. Easily felt smooth again and enjoyed my trips in my flip flops and sandals. I may buy the course roll to make it quicker when they are really rough. Make sure you do it over a trash can or towel. You’ll be amazing by what comes off of your heels.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I love this product; however I bought this in October and it came charged so I just now had to charge it. Last night I pulled out the charger and the charger is not working. This is the first time I tried to use it and it does not work. I'm so disappointed because I use this on a daily basis! Other than the charger not working, this is an awesome product. I gave it only one star because of the charger not working and now I cannot use it. I'm hoping the company will send me a new charger so I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mima007

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Buy a pumice stone instead!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Buy a pumice stone instead! I was looking for a quick fix and so I purchased this product. I've used it, as directed, for the last few months and have not noticed any change in skin texture, calluses, etc. I don't have major callus problems, but I had hoped that this would at least soften my heels. It hasn't. It produces a lot of dust, which makes you believe that it is actually doing something, but it does not produce results. Don't waste your hard-earned money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Olson

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had found this earlier
customer_reviews.text: I have type 2 diabetes and was having trouble with a callous on the bottom of my foot that would thicken and have to be cut off by a Doctor. After several times of going through this I went to a foot specialist who in turn sent me to a wound center at the hospital. The Doctor there remove the callous and then smoothed the area down. He suggested that I obtain one of these and use the medium abrasive every other day or so and it should alleviate the problem. I'm glad to say it has and it should work for you also, easy to use and you'll see results immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Cracked feet no more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife, who had major cracks in her heels - probably a good 1/4 inch deep. She started using this, and within one week, all the cracks had disappeared! She cannot remember when her feet looked so good. It has also made a difference in how her shoes fit. I tried it, out of curiosity. I thought it would be painful if I moved off of a callous - not at all!. No pain, fast results, and no mess (did it over the toilet). The charger is handy - she simply takes her Amope into the shower in the morning, then dries it and sticks it on the wireless charger. Voila!
customer_reviews.author: Recalcitrant Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: My feet are thoroughly abused between working in a hospital and practicing Taekwondo. The file worked great at first. I liked having the two speeds available and thought that it did a great job. Then one day it just stopped working. The motor came on, but the roller wouldn't turn turn. I tried everything to get it working, but eventually had to trash it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SCnurseMom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It works relatively well but trying to pry off the roller is ridiculously hard. Pushing that side button while trying to remove the roller is like a 30 minute workout. Not sure I want to invest in more rollers only to struggle with getting them off. Now my body aches from the struggle. UPDATE: The roller was giving me problems, the defective end pieces wouldn't push inward. Replaced with new roller, works really well now. So problem solved. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Won’t shut off but great for 7 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it shaved down the rough portions of my heels. Great concept - HOWEVER it’s 7 months later and the Amope won’t shut off after I turn it on so now I’m waiting for the battery to run out. Also doesn’t easily sit well on the battery charger but can prop up the handle so no biggie. I think maybe my experience is an outlier as I can’t seem to find any blog or website addressing this. Hoping the seller will contact me (hoping!!).
customer_reviews.author: NYCmom

customer_reviews.title: Best foot filer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use to use the manual pedi egg product. That did eliminate the rough skin, but was rough and sometimes I'd hurt myself with it. This product takes the sanding approach (coarse and fine). I just got it today and used it as instructed (after charging it for 3 hours on the super fast charger) and instantly liked it. I would recommend this to everyone with rough feet that find it snagging on their socks, sheets, anything! I used it on dry skin on the lower setting and made sure to moisturize and put socks on immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using this and I like it, I only used the ultra coarse roller with the diamond crystals thus far but I have these stubborn hard areas on my feet because of the way I walk that seems to never go away even when I go get a professional pedicure they’re still there. But this filed right through them, my feet feel so soft. I can’t wait to use it again next time and try the regular coarse roller
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: I got the wet/dry pedi perfect But I didn't get the 3 refills, only got the 1 on the machine I also didn't get the head with the ball things on it and another different head... I assumed the different package ng statement meant the plastic the product was in... The price on Amazon website said $40 free shipping and handling... Not only did I get charged shipping and handling but the product cost $54
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Vellone

customer_reviews.title: This works fabulously!
customer_reviews.text: This Amope is so easy to use and does an excellent job on, well, everything. I not only use it on dry, calloused skin, but it works quite well as a fingernail emery board. My husband raves about his smooth heels - smoother than he's ever had, he says. Never seems to run out of power while using for quite a long time. I just ordered a couple of roller refills, but I don't even need them yet. The one that came with it is working fine and we've been using it several times a week for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Jacee

customer_reviews.title: The charging light stopped working and now it is dead.
customer_reviews.text: About 6 months after I bought it, the charging light stopped working so now you did not know if it is charging or not. This would not be that big of a deal BUT it was very finicky on how it sits on the charger. Sometimes it charges, sometimes it would not. So you never know when you go to use it whether the battery was charged..... or not. More times than not it seems like it was not charged. And now it will not charge at all and I have two unopened packs of rollers. So it lasted through 5 rollers and now it is dead. DO NOT BUY!!!! Substandard product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Harrop

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I insisted my wife purchase this for me instead of a Gift Card for a Pedicure at a nail shop and I am quite glad I did. My wife doubted this would work but I'm glad I was able to prove her wrong. This works great and the fact that it can be used in Wet or Dry that makes it a HUGE plus. I didn't think this would work as good as it has. Very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Better than the baterry operated one
customer_reviews.text: I had a battery version of this before, which I broke after over a year of using it by pressing to hard on the rotating head. This particular model is great! It is more powerful, and gets the job done. I’ve had it for about two months, and it works great. Just be patient as it takes time to remove the skin if you have accumulated tons of old layers of it! I also wouldn’t risk using it under running water.
customer_reviews.author: Monni

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until it stopped charging. I plug it in, the green light goes on and shows that it is fully charged but when I remove it from the charging station it won’t turn on. I bought this product in November 2018- it’s disgraceful that it no longer works. It’s too bad as I was a huge fan until it stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I got it about a month ago, I have used it twice, and went to recharge it. It just blinks and blinks and never fully charges. I had it charge for 24 hours once I got desperate because it would not stop blinking, but it turns on for a few seconds and then dies. I have only used it dry, so it is not like it got water in it, even though it is supposedly capable of that, I was not willing to try it in the shower because I have a hard time trusting water resistant electronics.
customer_reviews.author: pet pal

customer_reviews.title: Worthless charging cradle
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves it. But when you set out on the charging cradle is WON'T charge as if it's too light because you have to do alot of wiggling around for the light to come on THEN be extra careful in balancing something on top of it so the contacts are aligned and pressed together. Whoever designed the charging cradle did an absolute lousy job it's basically worthless! Has Amope improved the design and is there anything we consumers can do in attempt to have a working replacement??
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So much better....
customer_reviews.text: This one works so much better and quicker than the original Amope (which I really liked) because you're using it while your skin is still wet and soft in the shower. I waited for the price to come down locally (from close to $50) and finally bought this one. Wouldn't you know it- right afterward I found it clearanced at BJ's for less than the $39 I paid, and WITH EXTRA REPLACEMENT HEADS, that this one didn't have. Typical. Still really like the product. Definitely recommend this- but keep a look out for one with the replacement heads. I'm having a tough time trying to find them.
customer_reviews.author: RatherBeReading

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at How Well It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit it... I spent the money on this fully expecting to be disappointed. I couldn't believe for one minute that a product costing less than a pedicure could actually smooth and soften my feet like a pedicure does. I used it the day I received it, about a week ago, and haven't needed it since (applying lotion daily is helping too). The bottoms of my feet were in bad shape, but they're almost perfect now. I'm so happy with this item that this is actually the first product review I've written. I keep rubbing my heels together, amazed at how soft (and not painful) they feel. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Truesdale

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: So during the summer when I wear sandals all the time my feet needs a bit of love. When I used to file my feet down manually it would be like a 20 minute session. This little machine can get the job done in like 5 minutes!! I have not tried it "wet" but using it "dry" will produce a cloud of dried feet powder so perhaps wear a mask or do it in an open space.
customer_reviews.author: tin chau tso

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back in May 2020. I read many different reviews that said it stopped working/charging, but saw a lot of very good reviews too. I decided to go ahead with my purchase. I used it maybe once every 2 months. It was working pretty well. Until tonight. I want to remove a small callous on my toe and when I turned it on the motor started but the brush wasn’t spinning. I double/triple checked and brush was inserted correctly. It just will not spin. I should’ve went with my gut. Don’t buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WoW!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is true. Easy to use, and wow, does it ever take off the calluses! I only used it dry, but I am pretty sure that wet will be great too. The head is easy to remove to clean, and the recharge is really pretty fast. Not often we can get something that works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Mermagic

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good power on it. Unlike the battery operated ones, that are slow and stop if you apply pressure. This you can very freely have it close to your skin/flesh/foot and it continues to work without stopping. With the other brand name smaller device battery operated one you have to be ever so slightly touching your foot so it doesn't stop working. My footsies were so smooth, I kept rubbing them together in bed, to feel it. The charge stay on long. I used it a long time without having to charge it. Handle feels ergonomic and comfortable in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Used it once and it worked fine. Went to charge it for another use and it doesnt turn on at all. I've tried every plug in the house thinking maybe the first outlet was bad. Nope. It has the light on like its charging but when I go to use it nothing happens. Time to buy something else! Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Serina Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Like smooth feet with occasional cuts? Keep reading!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I can finally take my socks off while I am on the couch and not worry about my feet shedding all over the place. Just make sure that you do not use it in one place for too long. When I put lotion on my feet the next day, I felt all the nips and scraps from using it on the sensitive areas of my foot. Other than that this is a great product! Why isn’t it marketed towards men? You are missing out on a huge demographic of customers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Charger is Fussy
customer_reviews.text: Love this device! Has plenty of power. Took one star off because it's difficult to seat on the charging device. I have to jiggle it until the light shows it's charging, which can take as long as a minute. The charger is just a little fussy, but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This Product is awesome. It really helps with Psoriasis on Feet. It removes the Plaque well. After two weeks the piggies are looking smooth. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kalish

customer_reviews.title: Hello sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled for years with dry, cracked heels and always thought of electronic foot files like this as a bit of a gimmick. On a whim, I decided to give this one a try. Wow! My heels have been completely transformed in less than a week! I highly recommend using in combination with a high quality foot cream (I'm having great success with O'Keefe's Healthy Feet) for really amazing results. I'm now able to wear sandals that for years have been pushed to the back of the closet.
customer_reviews.author: MurphMonster

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I didn't use this sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I love that I can use it on wet or dry skin but besides that, my feet are so soft now!! It took me about 10 min to get each foot smooth but it is so worth it. The only reason I rated it 4 stars is because I have very dry feet and maybe I should have gotten the amope with the extr coarse head so all the dry skin could have come out quicker
customer_reviews.author: mani S.

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t give too many reviews, but this item deserves it. I have(had) heels so dry and cracked they were tearing up my socks, so I decided to give this a try and it worked! Socks went on today with nary a snag! Two caveats: don’t apply too much pressure. Take the time to let the roller do the work you. If you apply pressure you’ll slow it down and your skin will start to get hot. And secondly, plump the extra $ for the rechargeable version. It’ll be worth it in the long run. Now I wish I had taken before and after photos.....
customer_reviews.author: SusanZ

customer_reviews.title: Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this thing! I have an issue with people touching my feet so getting a pedi at a salon is a no from me. This gives you salon quality results! Takes a little long to charge and only lasts approx 45 mins if you run it on high, but totally worth it! I got it for Christmas and I love it. Can use in shower or on dry skin. And replacement heads can be found on Amazon without paying a fortune in box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Woodley

customer_reviews.title: don't last
customer_reviews.text: The product quits working after around 40 or 50 uses - I only use once a week and have had this for just around 1 year, and now it is dead. I can't find any information on the box or the instructions for this product as far as warranty. this is the second one I have purchased and will be the last. Not worth the cost and price of replacement heads. Going back to good old pumice stones
customer_reviews.author: Anita W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had problem with my feet all my life. been using hand held callous stones for years everyday. this amope pedi perfect wet & dry foot file is the ticket. i highly recommend this chargeable foot file.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Will

customer_reviews.title: Works at first and then seems to malfunction after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Amope a handful of times in the past several months since purchasing, mostly to trim the nails of my 7.5lb Boston Greyhound. I have charged it twice, maybe three times. It now does not work very well. It starts and stops and intermittently and seems to have no real power and will stop spinning if a small amount of pressure is applied to it while the roller is spinning. This is on a complete, full charge. I am going to try to get a replacement, but I do not see an option thru Amazon by which to make contact with the company.
customer_reviews.author: P X

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: My old one had holes that accommodated the square pegs on the cartridge, this one doesn't. It has one square hole and one round hole. The cartridge just spun twice in place, then stopped moving. I guess they didn't know square pegs and round holes don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Caterwual

customer_reviews.title: Love this file!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot file I’ve ever used (and I used to do pedicures professionally). I like mine so much I bought one for both my mom and sister. My feet have never been softer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel like silk
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I would recommend using it over a few days, gradually working away the layers of calluses. I also found that a lighter touch does the best job so the grinder keeps spinning at a constant speed. I started with the coarse attachment and fine tuned with the blue grinder. I haven’t tried it in water and yes, you will have dust flying off your feet when using it dry so be prepared for that. I also purchased the lotion and love that as a follow up treatment. After a few times you’ll find the last rough patches and eliminate those too. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great foot file!!️
customer_reviews.text: Nail salons take so long, and when they scraped my feet it tickles. I needed this item after 17 year's of wearing combat boots. Get in shower, come out sit down use this little foot file and I am done in 10 minutes!!️ Feet as smooth and soft as a babies bottom🤗
customer_reviews.author: sandymonet

customer_reviews.title: If your feet are jacked get this
customer_reviews.text: If your feet are jacked... I mean seriously dry and seriously cracked and if you got callouses that are hard as a rock you need to get this. You will have baby soft feet very. I personally think it works better dry.
customer_reviews.author: Khat

customer_reviews.title: The best !
customer_reviews.text: I’m not stretching the truth, this is thee best way to keep your feet smooth, I use stones other feet products from Walmart, I go to a foot doctor every three months to get my nails and calluses smoothed. But this product is keeping my calluses away, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Great concept needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 3 of these now. On the 1st one the battery would only last for 1 foot and be dead. Had the same problem with a second one and that one also stripped out so the thing would stop spinning it would just quick. We'll see how the 3rd one goes.
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Amope worked really well. I was afraid that I might over "sand" my feet, but that's pretty hard to do with this tool, so it is pretty fool proof. The only negative in my opinion was that battery dies after about 20 minutes, which is probably just enough to do both feet but you have to charge it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: JLbeauTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This product really works and I love it; however, it really doesn’t last. I bought my third one in November and it does died on me in May. Out of the blue, it just stops turning on. This has happened before and I love it so much I just bite the bullet and order another. Moving forward, though, I’m just going back to traditional callus removers as it’s too expensive to buy a fourth time and have it die again in a few months
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Before and After
customer_reviews.text: Recive the package good. The Ample Pedi works excellent on my foot heel. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it despite annoying charging
customer_reviews.text: The charging station on this is a pain and I always tell myself to go and leave a review about how annoying it is. But then I use and am always impressed by how long it holds a charge and how powerful it is. Plus, it's waterproof so that charging base is probably the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Carly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great at getting at those stubborn calus.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of occasional use, it has began to leak battery acid and is eating away at the plastic. I had to throw it away. It was great to use until this happened. I wish I could return it but my return window closed. Would give 5 stars if they would send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Arista93

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I tried other versions that were not rechargeable but this one is the best. The finish is great so it will not slip out of your hand. Rechargeable capability will save money on batteries. Replacement heads are easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my bad calluses.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 40 now but was born 2.5 months early. As such they used my heels to draw bloodwork when I was in the hospital. My heels have been heavily callused literally my entire life. This is the very best product I’ve used to manage it. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: GingerMan512

customer_reviews.title: scrubby
customer_reviews.text: This one was a gift, I hope the recipient likes it as much as I like the one I have, easy to use, the charge holds a long time, I don't care for the cradle type charger, but I'll buy another after the one I have wears out.
customer_reviews.author: kevin koffel

customer_reviews.title: If you have feet you need this thing
customer_reviews.text: OK I’m a guy and I use this thing ...... super embarrassing but you have no idea that you need this for your feet until you get it ...... It’s also fun to watch people are amazed and contrite off a corn on your foot....
customer_reviews.author: Charles golden

customer_reviews.title: Won't recharge after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Amope Pedi for just over a year (purchased Oct 2017) and already it won't charge. I leave it on the charging stand for days and get maybe 30 feeble seconds out of it. Since the rechargeable battery is not replaceable, this item is now ready for the garbage heap. For $40.00, I think you should be able to get more than 16 months out of a product, so I will definitely not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB1994

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for your dry, cracked feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a automatic file before and this changed my life! I have super dry feet and I’m always super self conscious about it. My feet feel so smooth and look great! I like the rechargeable capability and can’t wait to try to exfoliating attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job with callous removal
customer_reviews.text: Painless, easy to use. Does a great job. Better than the pedicure factory could do. Do not hesitate to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This thing does not work
customer_reviews.text: This tool looks like a good thing but what it does is when held with enough pressure to actually sand your feet .....the wheel then stops. Don't waste your time or money on this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Chickiewick

customer_reviews.title: Worked until it didnt and now its  $70 nail file
customer_reviews.text: I loved this because it worked for about 9 months. Now it just completely stopped. I hear it make noise but nothing spins. What an expensive disappointment. Its like buying a $70.00 nail file. That is what I feel like I just got stuck with.
customer_reviews.author: LUCY

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a Taiff Soft Feet Pedicure - Professional Skin and Callus Remover but it got too HOT on the feet and the round disks covered only a small area. This product does a much better job at a lesser price. It does not get hot on the feet. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: clvmprofesora

customer_reviews.title: really like this foot file
customer_reviews.text: When my foot skin gets dry and/or cracked I can easily remove the dead skin. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has a tendency to have dry cracked feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: OKay but way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I works but I wear alot of flip flops and go barefoot alot and I get callouses- this helps but it is really not THAT powerful. It is still a decent tool but not worth 30-40.00!! Sell it for $20 and it would be a decent deal
customer_reviews.author: xyz123

customer_reviews.title: You've got to get one.
customer_reviews.text: This foot file is the best. I got one for myself, my mother, and my sister. We all love it. It only takes a few minutes and have beautiful soft feet. I highly recommend this. It works best with the rougher replacement pieces that you will have to buy separately though. The blue roller that comes with it doesn't do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Rk

customer_reviews.title: Loved product but it failed after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, and worked well WHILE it worked. It wouldn't turn on after a couple uses. Then when I could have returned it, it started working again, only to fail after one more use - this time after the "return window" had closed. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful One

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all of my life?!!!! This product is amazing and it really works! I use it almost daily once I am out of the shower and it leaves my feet super smooth and soft! It does not hurt at all and it works super quick! The only thing I would change is the charger for this product, which it was more stable but other than that I love this product and I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rose

customer_reviews.title: Honestly a miracle product!
customer_reviews.text: I really expected this to be just another product that didn't deliver but boy was I happily mistaken! I even said to my husband that the 'dead skin' being ground off and airborne in the commercial was clearly edited because there's no way it works THAT well.....until we got it and I tried it on his feet and marveled at the satin-like softness of his once grizzled and villainous feet. It was a miracle! If you're considering buying this, do it! Your sandal ready feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Amope Pedi Perfect Wet & Dry Foot File
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my foot file but it did not live up to what I expected. I am very fortunate that my feet are not dry and cracked like in some of the pictures I saw online as I moisturize my feet most nights after bathing. However, I do have some calluses below my big toe- foot pads before the arch. I struggled and was unable to remove the calluses as much as I wanted. I would not buy the Pedi Foot File again; it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Worked well the first time...only the first time
customer_reviews.text: My verdict is still out on this. It worked well the first time I used it. Now it just seems to “whine” when I turn it on, then it stops anytime any pressure is applied. I wish it continued to work well...but it isn’t anymore.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiGlamRus

customer_reviews.title: Requires a babysitter to make sure it stays charging
customer_reviews.text: Charger is badly engineered. No matter where or how u place this thing its so delicate and barely there that if you breathe near it, the charging stops. The power buttons are placed in a spot where you will accidentally shut it off or change speed when using....every time all the time. Couldve been placed on the underside. Duh
customer_reviews.author: Ldzuro

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The best Amope yet! It recharges, it works great. I just hope that it doesn't stop working like the 2 regular Amopes did
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: For the most part I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This think made a big difference the first time I used it. It's not perfect it sputters and stops and slows down but even with that I think it was a great purchase. The charging station isn't a tight fit with the device so that might have something to do with the erratic performance.
customer_reviews.author: one girls opinion

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It's been 3 days now and my feet feel amazing my feet wasn't really rough but they needed some TLC and this product helped them out alot,this product really works and this is one of the best things I've brought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jekisha angel

customer_reviews.title: Can not find the blue replacement files.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but the replacment files dont fit.It came with blue replacement files.I bought the black ones 2x,they dont fit.Very disappointed. PLEASE HELP ME GET THE CORRECT ONES THAT WORK WITH THIS PRODUCT. sincerely, monika_burmann@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: monika w. burmann

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of power battery has lasting power.
customer_reviews.text: The emery wheel wears out and leaves the stones smooth quickly. All in all I am very pleased with the Amope Pedi has been great. My feet are very rough and callused needing to be polished every day. I would recommend this product to others and purchase again myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sofie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This works great but getting it to charge is tricky
customer_reviews.text: This works great but getting it to charge is tricky. It doesn't stay on the charger unless I put something under the handle to help lift it up to make a connection. That part is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: works great - I had purchased a knock off of this product and was never happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Asbury

customer_reviews.title: My feet are normal again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not someone who files my feet regularly, but wearing sandals all the time had made my feet hard. The cracking got so deep it started to hurt. After just a few uses, my feet are back to being soft and smooth, no more cracks or callouses. This is much more efficient than using a regular file!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Geiman

customer_reviews.title: Ended up buying two
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife - she loves it so much I just ordered another one for my daughter for her birthday and had it shipped to her in California. Nice job! K Powers
customer_reviews.author: Kp~

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this product, but it stopped working after only a few weeks and right after I bought refills. I came on amazon to buy it again, not realizing how much I paid the first time. It is way too expensive to die after such a short time. I’m going to find something different.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime White

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 3 refills included but ended up being the cheaper model with NO REFILL ROLLER included. I could have just paid less and got the cheaper brand to begin with. I hate not getting what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than ten uses!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS. This product was not worth $50. The motor is weak and will stop when it touches your foot. You have to use a light touch to make it work effectively. I was enjoying the product albeit a bit frustrating to use, but it then quit charging after less than 10 uses. It will be completely charged but won’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Chase R.

customer_reviews.title: I'm somewhat disappointed in this item
customer_reviews.text: Again, I'm somewhat disappointed in this item, don't feel it's worth the money. It works better dry than wet but it just doesn't have enough power to really do the job. If you press hard on it, it just stops working. It needs more power and coarser grain.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Rosario

product_meta.title: Amope Pedi Perfect Wet & Dry Foot File, Callous Remover for Feet, Hard and Dead Skin - Rechargeable & Waterproof (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Amope Pedi Perfect Wet & Dry Rechargeable Foot File, Regular Coarse.
feature_bullets: Soft feet in minutes: Gently and effectively buffs away rough, dry feet and hard calloused skin effortlessly. Turn cracked heels into silky smooth ones with just one use.
Waterproof: Now you can get a perfect Pedi in the shower or in the bath tub. Use only with Amole Pedi perfect wet & dry rechargeable foot file supply unit
Waterproof: Now you can get a perfect Pedi in the shower or in the bath tub. Use only with Amole Pedi perfect wet & dry rechargeable foot file supply unit

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
